articles.title: Bill Gates: Microsoft founder to give most of $200bn fortune to Africa - BBC
articles.summary: Bill Gates to give most of his $200bn fortune to Africa Bill Gates, who founded tech giant Microsoft, is the fifth-richest person in the world Microsoft founder Bill Gates says that most of his fortune will be spent on improving health and education services in Africa over the next 20 years.
